about_the_game:
Remains Of Morrow is a third person story driven game that centers around the final quest for a wizards that was at one considered to be a hero in his prime. The quest is given to him by a stranger whose family he couldn't save in the war against evil. Players are asked to take control of the wizard in go into realms the stranger can't go to retrieve a special item that can reverse his town's fortunes. Along the way you'll dive deep into the wizard's past and find out the choices that brought to where he is today. Then he can remember why this all started, where he may have went wrong and just might find a way to fix the impossible.

Key Features:


  • Epic narration with multiple endings and some RPG features
  • Includes light fighting and puzzle solving
  • Engrossing music and immersive gameplay and environment
  • Made by a solo developer

short_description: An atmospheric third person game about a wizard's final quest. The game tells the story of the victories and failures of a wizard who was once considered the best. Now in the twilight years of his life he’s asked by a stranger for a favor. Take control of the wizard and complete his final mission.
